Mate,

unfortunately no ID here, but you can easily achieve the same result by doing some easy tweaking of Avant Garde in Illustrator (see below which took about a minute). But obviously if you need to set more text then just a logo that won't be an option.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080730im_/http:/typophile.com/files/studio_6739.png)
The 's' shape makes me think this is a customised Futura, but basically Sebastian nails it on the head.

hi mate,

as i've emailed you already, it's a custom font by monotype: opel sans.

[http://www.customfonts.com/csview.asp?cs=Opel&part=6](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080730/http:/www.customfonts.com/csview.asp?cs=Opel&part=6 "http://www.customfonts.com/csview.asp?cs=Opel&part=6")

AFAIK you can't buy it.

best,

// alex
